Episode.GuestStars: |Alec Kirazian|Benjamin Thys|Constantin Tripes|David Meunier|Evan Hall|Jean Brassard|Jean-Luc McMurtry|Kelley Rae O'Donnell|Laila Robins|Louis Butelli|Natalie Paul|Pearl Rhein|Peter Bradbury|Thamer Jendoubi|Valery Lessard|Ward Billeisen|
Episode.Overview: After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond finds himself alone in hostile territory unsure of who—if anyone—he can trust. With few leads to go on, Liz and the Task Force venture into unknown danger as they race to find him.
